thread.title: Denis Suarez set to stay at Barcelona as agent denies he will join Napoli
thread.title_full: Denis Suarez set to stay at Barcelona as agent denies he will join Napoli

author: ituckey
title: Denis Suarez set to stay at Barcelona as agent denies he will join Napoli
text:
NOU WAY DENIS WILL LEAVE Denis Suarez set to stay at Barcelona as agent denies he will join Napoli 
Speculation over the Spain midfielder's future has soared, especially as Barca have been linked with Real Madrid's Isco By Ian Tuckey 25th March 2017, 9:27 pm Updated: 25th March 2017, 10:29 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments DENIS SUAREZ is ready to stay and fight for a Barcelona place after his agent rubbished links with Napoli. 
The Spain midfielder has mainly been a stand-in since returning to the Camp Nou last summer but has still played 32 games. Reuters 4 Denis Suarez is keen to fight for his Barcelona place, according to his agent 
Speculation over the 23-year-old’s future has soared as Barca have been linked to Real Madrid ‘s Isco . 
Keep up to date with ALL the LA LIGA gossip and transfers on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
But Suarez ‘s agent Felix Grande told Italy’s Radio CRC : “We have had no contact, from Napoli or any other club.” 
Suarez was an outstanding playmaker on loan at Sevilla two seasons ago and with Villarreal last season. Getty Images Barcelona are thought to be interested in Real Madrid and Spain midfielder Isco Getty Images Suarez was a big hit with Villarreal but has never hit the same heights for Barca 
But he has struggled to make at impact at Barca this term. 
And fellow Spanish international Isco, 24 is seen as a possible replacement. 
Former Malaga star Isco hit Real’s 100th goal of the season in their 3–1 win at Osasuna last month.
